Program Description \n(guideline): Rebate of $100 per kilowatt-hour of usable battery system energy capacity (up to $1500) for new battery storage system installations.
Contractor Restrictions: Discuss battery storage system options with a Participating Solar Contractor
Other Restrictions:
*Must be a compatible battery storage system permanently connected to the Fort Collins Utilities distribution grid.
*The battery system must also remain connected to the internet.  
*Customers must meet eligibility and interconnection requirements of theâ€¯Residential Solar Rebate Program and shall use the PowerClerk application platform, populating the battery incentive fields. 
*One or more batteries can be added to an existing solar PV system or new solar PV system installation.  
*The battery system must be programmed either for storing surplus solar energy to meet site loads or optimized to the Time-of-Day rate structure.
*Customers shall support Fort Collins Utilities in accessing battery inverter operation data for monitoring purposes.
Financing Details: Financing option: Fort Collins Utilities Epic Loan.
